measured_by: self-reported Likert scale (1 = No Confidence to 5 = Full Confidence)
justification: "After a decision is made, participants are asked to enter their confidence in that choice, on a Likert scale of 1 (No Confidence) to 5 (Full Confidence)."

measured_by: percentage of correct classifications across 50 two-choice trials
justification: "Each choice was correct on 50% of the trials… We compared participants' mean accuracy in the experiment across conditions."

measured_by: proportion of participant choices matching the AI prediction
justification: "Participants followed the AI predictions more often when the AI was correct versus when the AI was incorrect… the mean proportion of participant choices matching AI prediction."
"We also assessed reaction time… There was no significant main effect of AI condition on participants' reaction time."
